name: Muzzle Compensator
effects: Grants the weapon the "Compensated" quality. If it already had that quality, further reduce the pool penalty of Full Auto attacks by 1.

name: Silencer
effects: Provides the weapon with the "Silenced" quality. If the weapon had the "Loud" quality, it loses it instead.

name: Flash Hider
effects: Hides the flash of the weapon's muzzle, making it difficult to detect you at long ranges.

name: Heavy-Duty Coupler
effects: Increases the base damage by 20%, but reduces magazine capacity by 30%.

name: Focus Lense
effects: Increases the Penetrating quality by 20%.

name: Heat Ventilation System
effects: Allows to use the gun for more than 10 shots in vacuum.

name: Red Dot Scope
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when shooting the weapon at optimal range, but -1 when shooting within maximum range.

name: Thermal Imaging Scope
effects:
Provides Handling (+2) when shooting at living creatures, but Handling (-4) when shooting anything else.
Additionally, all injury rolls that you cause have 2 less dice.

name: Night Vision Scope
effects: Turns the difficulty increase during darkness into a mere -1 pool modifier, but adds +1 difficulty when using the scope in bright environments.

name: ACOG 4x Scope
effects: Increases all ranges by 50%, but makes you suffer Handling (-1) when shooting within optimal range or under.

name: Marksman Scope
effects:
Increases all ranges by 100%, but also increases the lower end of the "optimal range" by 20 squares.
If the new minimum range is equal to or higher than the upper end of the "optimal range", then the upper end simply becomes 10 squares higher than the new minimum.

name: Smart Targeting Scope
effects: Adds a -2 pool penalty to any attempts to actively dodge your attacks.

name: Fast Trigger Unit
effects: The weapon gains the Burst quality equal to 1/5th of the unmodified magazine capacity (to a minimum of 5). It also gains the Full Auto quality equal to three times the weapon's Burst quality.

name: Overcharged Plasma Cell
effects: Allows you to fire the weapon with a +30% base damage bonus at double the shot amount spent per attack.

name: Smartgun Integration
effects: So long as the user possesses a smart eye cyberware or an armor with Visual Enhancers, they add Handling (+2).

name: AP Chamber
effects: Increases the ammo cost by 30%, but the weapon adds Penetrating (+2).

name: Waterproof Internals
effects: Makes the weapon operable under water and reduces pool penalties when the weapon is wet.

name: Extended Frame
effects: This mod does not count against the mod limit (but does count against the Mechanism slot), but instead adds +1 mod that can be installed in the gun.

name: Tactical Folding Stock
effects:
Provides the "Concealed (3)" quality. If the weapon already was concealed, reduce the level of the quality by 1 instead.

* Not applicable to especially large firearms like Machineguns, Rocket Launchers or similar.
* Not applicable to pistols.

name: Adjustable Combat Stock
effects:
Provides Handling (+1).

* Not applicable to pistols.

name: Shock Absorption Stock
effects:
Grants the weapon the "Compensated" quality. If it already had that quality, further reduce the pool penalty of Full Auto attacks by 1.

* Not applicable to pistols.

name: Ergonomic Grip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) on the first attack after switching to a new target.

name: Foregrip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when shooting from out of cover.

name: Precision Grip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when only shooting single rounds (no Burst or Full Auto fire).

name: Shock-Absorption Grip
effects: Reduces the total AP cost of Full-Auto attacks by 1.

name: High-Cap
effects: Increases magazine capacity by 50% (round down).

name: Drum / Block
effects: Reduces handling by 1, increases reload AP cost by 1, but triples the magazine capacity (increases capacity to a minimum of 15).

name: Quick-Reload
effects:
Reduces the AP cost to reload the weapon by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
For shell-based weapon, you can spend twice the AP to load three times the shells.

name: Laser Sight
effects: Provides a free trigger on every attack after the first against the same target. Having the Laser Sight active makes your position very apparent.

name: Digital Laser Sight
effects: Same as Laser Sight but without the drawback - you require AR glasses or a smart eye to see your laser.

name: Flashlight
effects: Illuminates dark areas, but also blinds enemies after aiming at them for the first time (if in a dark area).

name: Underbarrel Grenade Launcher
effects:
Allows to make one shot with the unmodified weapon profile of the Grenade Launcher.

* Can only be attached to firearms that are two-handed, and are neither pistols nor MPs.

name: Bayonet Mount
effects: Allows to perform melee attacks with the unmodified weapon profile of a Knife.

name: Bipod
effects: Can be braced stationary by spending 3 AP. When doing so, the weapon gains Handling (+2).

name: Dual Scope Mount
effects:
Allows the installation of two different scopes that you have to pay separately (including the option of just installing one and keeping the unmodified variant, aka stock sights). The second scope you install doesn't count against your mod limit of the gun.
It costs 1 AP to switch between the available sights.
